trends: There has been one other sighting in Kittery
There were no other sightings in Kittery on or around March 25th 2007
Summary: Extremely bright light moving very fast
divs: Sighting DetailsMy wife and I were travelling south on Rt 1 and we both noticed an extremely bright light moving very fast from west to east. I have lived in this area for 25 years and hve never seen anything like this before. It moved very rapidly and in a matter of 10 seconds it was gone.
